title: 7 Fast Ways to Delete One or All Bookmarks in Any Browser

steps.title: Right-click the bookmark and click Delete.
steps.content: Right-click the bookmark and click Delete . You can do this for bookmarks found in the bookmarks bar underneath the address bar. [1] X Research source If you don't see the bookmarks bar, press Ctrl + Shift + B (Windows) or Cmd + Shift + B (Mac) to make it visible.

steps.title: Delete multiple bookmarks (optional).
steps.content: Delete multiple bookmarks (optional). If you have lots of bookmarks to delete at once, do the following: Click All Bookmarks in the top-right corner of the window. Click Open Side Panel to see All Bookmarks . Click the pencil icon near the top of the panel. Select all bookmarks you want to delete. Click the trashcan icon.

steps.title: Tap ••• or ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ••• or ⋮ . On iOS, this is at the bottom. On Android, this is at the top.

steps.title: Tap Bookmarks.
steps.content: Tap Bookmarks . This is next to the star icon. You'll see a list of all current bookmarks.

steps.title: Tap Edit.
steps.content: Tap Edit . This is at the bottom.

steps.title: Select all bookmarks you want to delete.
steps.content: Select all bookmarks you want to delete. You'll see a checkmark next to it. If you delete a folder, all of the bookmarks inside will be deleted as well.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . The bookmark(s) will be deleted.

steps.title: Click the sidebar button.
steps.content: Click the sidebar button. This is in the toolbar.

steps.title: Click Bookmarks.
steps.content: Click Bookmarks . You'll see a list of all your current bookmarks .

steps.title: Control-click the bookmark and click Delete.
steps.content: Control-click the bookmark and click Delete . This will immediately remove the bookmark. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the book icon.
steps.content: Tap the book icon. This is at the bottom of Safari.

steps.title: Tap the book icon again.
steps.content: Tap the book icon again. This is the first tab.

steps.title: Tap Edit.
steps.content: Tap Edit . This is in the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Tap - , and then Delete.
steps.content: Tap - , and then Delete . Do this for each bookmark you want to delete.

steps.title: Right-click the bookmark and click Delete Bookmark.
steps.content: Right-click the bookmark and click Delete Bookmark . You can do this for bookmarks found in the bookmarks bar underneath the address bar.

steps.title: Delete multiple bookmarks (optional).
steps.content: Delete multiple bookmarks (optional). If you have lots of bookmarks to delete at once, do the following: Click ☰ . Click Bookmarks . Click Manage bookmarks . Hold Ctrl and click each bookmark you want to delete. Alternatively, press Ctrl + A to select all. Right-click the bookmarks. Click Delete Bookmarks .

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Bookmarks.
steps.content: Tap Bookmarks . You can find this at the top of the pop-up menu.

steps.title: Tap Edit.
steps.content: Tap Edit . This is in the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Tap - , and then Delete.
steps.content: Tap - , and then Delete . Do this for each bookmark you want to delete.

steps.title: Right-click the bookmark and click Delete.
steps.content: Right-click the bookmark and click Delete . You can do this for bookmarks found in the bookmarks bar underneath the address bar.

steps.title: Delete multiple bookmarks (optional).
steps.content: Delete multiple bookmarks (optional). If you have lots of bookmarks to delete at once, do the following: Click the Favorites icon (star with three lines). Click ••• . Click Open favorites page . Click each bookmark you want to delete. Click Delete .
